alert.note: Alert for Crockett (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 10:33PM CDT until April 01 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL CROCKETT...SOUTHEASTERN GIBSON...SOUTHWESTERN CARROLL AND NORTHEASTERN MADISON COUNTIES... At 1032 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Adair, or near Humboldt, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Humboldt, Milan, Fairview, Three Way, Medina, Gadsden, Howley, Hickory Flat, Youngs Crossing, West, Jumbo, Windy City, Lavinia, Mason Grove, Sitka, Whitthorne and Goat City. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for west Tennessee. Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure.
